settings.heading: Why We Started Optibio
settings.description:
The supplement industry has a trust problem. Too many brands hide behind proprietary blends, use underdosed ingredients, and make claims without evidence. Consumers are left guessing whether what's on the label is actually in the bottle.

We started Optibio because we believed you deserve better ‚Äî clinical-grade supplements with full transparency, real dosages, and every single claim backed by peer-reviewed research. Not marketing hype. Science.

settings.heading: Our Mission
settings.subheading: We believe the supplement industry can do better ‚Äî and we're proving it, one batch at a time.
settings.problem_text: Most supplement brands cut corners. They hide behind "proprietary blends," use the cheapest ingredients available, and make health claims without any clinical evidence to back them up.
settings.solution_text: Every Optibio product meets the highest standards for transparency, quality, and clinical evidence. What's on our label is in the bottle ‚Äî verified by independent labs.

settings.text: Proprietary blends hiding real ingredient dosages
No third-party testing or batch verification
Health claims without published clinical evidence
Full ingredient transparency ‚Äî every dosage listed
Every batch third-party tested and traceable
Only claims supported by published clinical data

settings.heading: Our Standards
settings.subheading: Six non-negotiable commitments that define every Optibio product.
settings.next_text: Ashwagandha is our first product ‚Äî but not our last. We're developing additional clinical-grade supplements targeting stress, sleep, focus, and recovery. Each will meet the same rigorous standards: patented ingredients, clinical dosages, third-party testing, and full traceability.
settings.cta_subheading: Join thousands who have chosen clinical-grade quality over empty marketing claims.

settings.title: FDA-Audited Facility
settings.description: Manufactured at an FDA-audited, cGMP-certified pharmaceutical-grade facility in the United States.

settings.title: Third-Party Tested
settings.description: Every batch is sent to independent labs for heavy metal, microbial, potency, and identity testing.

settings.title: Full-Spectrum Root Only
settings.description: We use only root extract ‚Äî never cheaper leaf or aerial parts that dilute potency and bioavailability.

settings.title: Clinical Dosage: 600mg
settings.description: The exact dosage used in peer-reviewed clinical trials ‚Äî not an underdosed marketing gimmick.

settings.title: 90 Capsules Per Bottle
settings.description: 50% more capsules than most competitors. A full 45-day supply per bottle for better value.

settings.title: Full Batch Traceability
settings.description: Every bottle is traceable from raw material sourcing to your doorstep. Verify your batch online anytime.
